product_name: REI Heavyweight Long Underwear Bottoms - Men's - Special Buy
long_description: The REI Heavyweight half-zip men's long underwear bottoms are made of mostly recycled Polartec(R) polyester microfleece, keeping you warm while skiing, hiking or running in cold temperatures. This lightweight, breathable base layer features a fleeced interior to trap body heat next to skin. Long underwear bottoms can also be worn alone in mild weather. Special buy.
short_description: The REI Heavyweight half-zip men's long underwear bottoms are made of mostly recycled Polartec(R) polyester microfleece, keeping you warm while skiing, hiking or running in cold temperatures.
